paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from a study on breast cancer patients.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We detected nine pathogenic variants in the BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes in 8 out of 75 patients (10.66%).

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with breast cancer.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the studied population.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical association.
variants.additional_notes: Detected in a patient with breast cancer.
key_quotes: We detected nine pathogenic variants in the BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes in 8 out of 75 patients (10.66%).
The pathogenic variant c.5645C>A (BRCA2) had been previously described in the ClinVar database.
